product_name: Mavic Cosmic Carbone 40 Wheelset with Tires
long_description: Weighing in at a featherweight 2085g, the Mavic Cosmic Carbone 40 Wheelset with Tires combines light weight and reliability with an exclusive carbon-fiber layup with aluminum spine. Exclusive technology creates a carbon fiber layup with high resistance to braking heat, excellent stability and stiffness; reinforced with aluminum spine. Rims have a drilling method that doesn't penetrate the tube-facing wall, enhancing wheel strength and rigidity because no holes means no weak points. Both hubs boast a microadjustable system that lets you dial in bearing performance; double-sealed cartridge bearings deliver excellent longevity and smooth spinning. 20/20 straight-pull, bladed steel spokes are laced radially on the front wheel; rear has radial lacing on the non-drive side, 2-cross on the drive side. Yksion Pro Griplink front tire maximizes grip and steering and Yksion Pro Powerlink rear tire maximizes power transfer and speed. Please note: these wheels are clincher-compatible only, with a recommended tire width of 19 - 28mm. Includes quick releases.
